attributes.action: Make CCTV mandatory in specialist provision.
attributes.additional_details:
Children/ young adults who are disabled may not be able to voice abuse and harm. Therefore it is vital for CCTV to be installed within all specialist  provision.

Children are at risk by CCTV not being put in specialist provision. These people are the most vulnerable in society they should be protected at all costs.
attributes.background: To ensure that those who are the most vulnerable in society are protected from harm and abuse.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Mandate CCTV in any educational setting that cares for children with SEND
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705801
